title: After I Power on the Phone, If the Password Is Required, What  Should I Do? If I Forget the Password, What Should I Do?
answer:
PIN is provided with the intelligent card. To obtain the personal identification number (PIN), see the instructions of the intelligent card or consult the operator.
PIN2 is provided with the intelligent card. To obtain PIN2, see the instructions of the intelligent card or consult the operator.
If you forget the password, contact the operator.
